G

getAllCompanies() - Method in interface dao.CompanyDAO
 
getAllCompanies() - Method in class dao.db.CompanyDaoDb
in this method the user can get all the existing companies in the system
getAllCompanies() - Method in class facade.AdminFacade
user can get all the existing companies from this method.
getAllCompanies(HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Admin_Rest_Facade
this method return all the companies that exist in the system and the companies details to the admin user.
getAllCoupon() - Method in interface dao.CouponDAO
 
getAllCoupon() - Method in class dao.db.CouponDaoDb
this method will get the user all the coupons in the system (of all the companies)
getAllCoupons() - Method in class dao.db.CustomerDaoDb
this method was writing so customers can see the coupon that they didn't purchased so they can buy theme
getAllCoupons() - Method in class facade.CompanyFacade
this method return all the company coupons (by the company id that saved in the facade in the log-in)
getAllCoupons(HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Company_Rest_Facade
this method give the details of all the company coupons to the company user .
getAllCoupons(HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Customer_Rest_Facade
this method give all the customer coupons.
getAllCustomers() - Method in interface dao.CustomerDAO
 
getAllCustomers() - Method in class dao.db.CustomerDaoDb
this method will give the user all the customers in the system
getAllCustomers() - Method in class facade.AdminFacade
this method give the user all the customers in the system .
getAllCustomers(HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Admin_Rest_Facade
this method return all the customers that exist in the system and the customers details to the admin user.
getAllPurchesedCoupons() - Method in class facade.CustomerFacade
this method allow the customer to get all the coupons that he bought.
getAllPurchesedCoupons(HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Customer_Rest_Facade
this method give the customer the details of all the coupons that he purchased (from the join table with his id )
getAllPurchesedCouponsByPrice(double) - Method in class facade.CustomerFacade
user can get all the coupon that he or she bought with lower or equal to the price he gave .
getAllPurchesedCouponsByPrice(double, HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Customer_Rest_Facade
the user give price and get all the coupons that he parched in that price and lower .
getAllPurchesedCouponsByType(CouponType) - Method in class facade.CustomerFacade
customer can get all the coupons that he or she bough from a specific type
getAllPurchesedCouponsByType(CouponType, HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Customer_Rest_Facade
this method give the customer the details of all the coupons that he purchased (from the join table with his id ) from the type that he want (from the coupon-type enum in the beans package )

getCoupon(long) - Method in class dao.db.CouponDaoDb

getCouponByEndDate(Date, HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Company_Rest_Facade
